name: JUMP FORCE
notes: **CONFIGURE AND INSTALL THE DEPENDENCIES FIRST** Instructions for DXVK support: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/How-to:-DXVK

input_menu.description:
Please read description first to ensure the game will work.
---------------------------------------------------------
Choose which graphics you are going to use to play the game:

content:
game:
  appid: 816020
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please read description first to ensure the game will work.

      ---------------------------------------------------------

      Choose which graphics you are going to use to play the game:'
    id: VALUE
    options:
    - nvidia_icd: Nvidia
    - radeon_icd.x86_64: AMD
    - intel_icd.x86_64: Intel
    preselect: NA
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    VK_ICD_FILENAMES: /usr/share/vulkan/icd.d/$INPUT_VALUE.json
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
